channel.title: kl_div on Orvin Demsy
channel.description: Recent content in kl_div on Orvin Demsy

item.title: KL divergence on iris dataset
item.description: KL Divergence on Multivariate Gaussian (Example on Iris Dataset) I was doing research in brain-computer interface and was interested in in the technique of transfer learning. Based on numerous papers I read, KL-divergence is a common method to measure similarity of distribution between subjects. At that time, I found an article that explained KL divergence to measure similarity on data with one variable [1]. But I could not find example KL divergence on multivariate data.
